data.title: Xtreme Air Trampoline Adventure Park Appleton, WI
data.meta_description: Huge trampoline park in Appleton, WI has dodgeball and basketball on trampolines, gladiator jousting, a three story rock wall, and so much more! This indoor jump park brings jumping to a whole new level.
data.text:
Save time when you arrive!

Fill out the liability waiver online.

You must be 18 years old to sign the liability waiver. Guests under 18 must have a parent or legal guardian complete the waiver.

Wisconsin’s Largest Indoor Trampoline & Adventure Park - Xtreme Air

Indoor Trampolines, Rock Climbing, Basketball and Dodgeball - Year Round Fun

Regardless of the weather outside, Xtreme Air Trampoline Park offers excitement and exercise for all ages; whether it’s catching air jumping, flipping and twisting on over 45,000 sq. ft of trampoline fun, jousting with your friends on our Gladiator Joust, climbing three stories high on Mt. Xtreme rock wall, perfecting your dunk at one of our three, 360 Slam Dunk basketball trampolines, or playing one of the most exhilarating games of dodgeball ever in one of our two self-contained dodgeball trampoline arenas.

Trampoline Birthday Parties, Slackline Trick Competitions, Workouts and Special Events

Make that birthday party special; book your event at Xtreme Air Trampoline Park. In addition to your own private room, and a full service concession area serving pizza, hot dogs, nachos, pretzels, healthy drinks and soda, we offer partygoers full use of all attractions including: Main Court Free Flight, Mt. Xtreme, Laser Maze, 360 Slam Dunk basketball trampolines, Airbag Freestyle, Gladiator Joust, Dodgeball, Fidget ladder, and X-Balance Slackline. Make that birthday a party that everyone will remember. Call now to reserve your party room and a day of trampoline fun for everyone. Our second floor mezzanine seating area offers a birds-eye view for parents or chaperones to watch the kids using the trampoline park below.

Family Friendly Attractions in the Fox Cities

Spend the day out and about with the whole family. Xtreme Air is the perfect attraction for all-inclusive family fun! Whether your kids are itty bitty or fully grown, they will love ALL that Xtreme Air has to offer.

Note: Children under 3 are not allowed during normal open jump hours. Special Tot Time is available.

Contact Wisconsin’s largest indoor trampoline and rock climbing park, Xtreme Air, for an extremely fun time in the Fox Cities, or download the safety waiver.
